Description
net.silthus.schat.channel
Contains the classes for creating and managing Channels.

Contains the classes and API for Chatters.

Contains the API for creating Commands.
net.silthus.schat.commands
Contains the central business logic implemented using the command pattern.

The API for dispatching and listening to internal SChatEvents.
